<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a5db4061b62e740850ad71806b1dbd60e">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::extractProbeIndex</a>(Discriminator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#afc49454167a56822ab9bf04310a2dbe1">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::extractProbeType</a>(Discriminator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Attr = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a87b1baf4f84945b1e2ef2366d0d14dad">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::extractProbeAttributes</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Discriminator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DwarfBaseDiscriminator =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#ad0c37806bfdb6415dbe3866307f6716c">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::extractDwarfBaseDiscriminator</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">                Discriminator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Round small factors to 0 to avoid over-counting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint32&#95;t IntFactor =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a0d966c8251ff32615370f3658cec6887">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::FullDistributionFactor</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Factor &lt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">          IntFactor &#42;= Factor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint32&#95;t V = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a65b110861bfbc06e20befde65915f078">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::packProbeData</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Index, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>, Attr, IntFactor, DwarfBaseDiscriminator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DIL = DIL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation/#ab7345daa994ad45abb206b757dda7f22">cloneWithDiscriminator</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Inst.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ae8f5bf5cc06f696b52c709677df00fbf">setDebugLoc</a>(DIL);</span></CodeLine>
